title: An Amish Year
features: From autumn harvesting and Christmas celebrations to spring cleaning and a special birthday party in the summer, a year in the life of a young Amish girl is captured in a colorfully illustrated, nonfiction picture book. Reprint.
description: can trace his ancestry to northwest Switzerland, where Jakob Ammann, founder of the Amish,was born. Though probably not a descendant of Ammann, Ammon enjoys driving his Old Order Amish friends to horse sales. A professor of children's literature at Penn State University, Mr. Ammon lives in Middletown, Pennsylvania.

has painted professionally as an illustrator and fine artist since 1983. She has created covers and picture books for most major U.S. publishers. Historic painting, portrait work, and corporate commissions fill most of her time now. Ms. Patrick lives in Pennsylvania.
